text.autoconfig.too-cheap.title: Too Cheap! Options
text.autoconfig.too-cheap.option.maxLeve: The maximum level cost (exclusive) an anvil will allow.
text.autoconfig.too-cheap.option.breakCh: Chance that an anvil takes damage after being used.
text.autoconfig.too-cheap.option.renameC: Set cost of renaming an item. Has to be greater than 0 or renaming is not possible.
text.autoconfig.too-cheap.option.maybeRe: Just adds to the base repair cost.
text.autoconfig.too-cheap.option.maybeEn: Just adds to the base enchantment cost.
